open_risks: Core PCE (and any inflation-adjacent components) triggers a real-rate shock that dominates any headline relief; NQ duration sensitivity highest
Policy headline gap risk persists despite tariff walkback: Greenland/NATO/framing could re-escalate, re-widening risk premia and lifting gold
Fed independence/governance tail: Cook case developments or Fed-chair nomination chatter reprice term premium and rates vol abruptly
Cross-asset adverse mix: equities weaken while yields rise (or gold up with yields up), indicating tighter financial conditions + hedging demand simultaneously
